name: Way of the Sun Soul
description: Monks who channel their inner light into radiant blasts of energy.

3.name: Radiant Sun Bolt
3.description: Gain a ranged spell attack dealing radiant damage with a 30-foot range and a d4 damage die, and spend 1 ki point to make two additional attacks as a bonus action after using it.

6.name: Searing Arc Strike
6.description: Immediately after taking the Attack action, spend 2 ki points to cast burning hands as a bonus action, with additional ki increasing the spell level.

11.name: Searing Sunburst
11.description: Create a 20-foot-radius sphere of radiant energy at a point within 150 feet; creatures failing a Constitution save take 2d6 radiant damage plus 2d6 per ki point spent (up to 3).

17.name: Sun Shield
17.description: You shed bright light in a 30-foot radius and can use your reaction to deal radiant damage equal to 5 + Wisdom modifier to creatures that hit you in melee.
